description:
Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

About XTB
XTB is a global financial institution trusted by over 1.7 million clients. We provide access to a wide range of investment options including stocks, ETFs,CFD trading on currencies, commodities, indices, and more. Our platform also includes Investment Plans, interest on uninvested funds and ISA. All of this is available in one easy-to-use app — a single, powerful ecosystem where your money works.

Buy stocks and ETFs commission-free
The XTB app gives you access to over 4500 stocks and ETFs from 16 major exchanges around the world. Invest in stocks and ETFs with 0% commission.*

Choose from thousands of CFDs
Trade CFDs based on currency pairs (Forex), commodities, indices, stocks, and ETFs.

Make the most of our savings solutions:

Investment Plans
At XTB, you can create a personalised Investment Plan that will help you regularly set aside small amounts, invest passively and reach your desired goals, like: travel, retirement, or a new house.

Interest on free funds
You can profit while waiting for the perfect investment opportunity. All your uninvested funds earn interest.

Flexible Stocks & Shares ISA
An ISA  is a tax-efficient savings and investment account that allows you to earn interest or returns without paying tax on them.

2FA - an extra layer of security
We implemented 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) through SMS verification to ensure that no one gains unauthorized access to your XTB account. 

Safe and secure deposits and withdrawals
Make a deposit instantly by credit/debit cards like Visa/Mastercard. Easily transfer funds between sub-accounts within XTB or withdraw to your personal bank account - all safely and securely. 

24h/5 support
Our customer service team offers support in 18 languages and is available 24/5 hours a day,  via email, chat or phone.

Free demo account
Open a free demo account in seconds and explore your investment ideas with zero risk. Experience real market conditions without using your own capital. When you’re ready, open a real  XTB account for free and start putting your money to work for real.

Trainings and webinars
Explore our extensive video library and gain access to hundreds of hours of educational webinars. Learn at your own pace with clear, structured content . 

Market news and analysis
Get breaking news and read professional market analysis from our award-winning research team.

Advanced charts and technical analysis
Find the best investment opportunities using over 35 indicators, different chart types, advanced technical analysis, and other features in the app.

Additional investing tools
Stay ahead with our suite of investing tools: track key macroeconomic events with the Economic Calendar, manage risk and plan using the Investor’s Calculator, set real-time Price Alerts to catch market moves and explore global Market Sentiment to make more informed decisions.

*For monthly turnover up to 100,000 EUR. Transactions above this limit will be charged a commission of 0.2% (minimum 10 GBP).
**CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 
72% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider.
You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

Your capital is at risk. The value of your investments may go up or down.Tax treatment depends on your individual circumstances and ISA regulations which may change.T&Cs apply.

Alior Mobile app

Join more than one million Alior Mobile app users and stay on top of your finances!

With Alior Mobile, you have quick and secure access to your money and many additional mobile banking features around the clock. In one place you may, among others:

  •  check your bank account balance and transaction history before logging in,
  •  make mobile and contactless payments with your phone or smartwatch,
  •  make standard and instant online internal transfers and transfers to another bank and to a telephone number, 
  •  withdraw cash from an ATM using a BLIK code and pay with BLIK at stationary and online stores,
  •  top up your prepaid phone, buy tickets for public transport and motorways and pay for parking,
  •  authorise Alior Online banking operations using PUSH notifications, 
  •  apply for credit facilities,
  •  set up deposits and other savings products,
  •  benefit from additional services and personalised offers.

We protect your data and money:

  •  we monitor the application 24/7 - if we notice an attempt of unauthorized access, we will block access to the application,
  •  we constantly enhance the application - we increase your comfort, availability of services and level of security,
  •  you log in with PIN or biometrics - if you forget to log out, we will do it for you,
  •  you verify and confirm online transactions in the mobile application
  •  you can quickly block your payment card if you lose it,
  •  we send you PUSH notifications about events related to your account or card and to verify the identity of the calling banker,
  •  you can hide the account balance and quickly change the card limits.

You may contact us in many ways: 

  •  you can contact the helpline directly from the app – after logging in, without additional verification,
  •  you can make a contact request regarding any credit facility,
  •  you can send us, for instance, a question, a suggestion or a disposition.

You may personalise the app so that it matches your needs:

  •  you can change the background image of the start screen,
  •  you can customise the app’s theme,
  •  you can create shortcuts you are most interested in,
  •  you can create a list of selected payees,
  •  you can arrange the order of items visible on your screen.

Once the app is downloaded and installed, you may create a personal account using the VideoSelfie function and activate the app, and then manage your products.

The Alior Mobile app is available in Polish, English, Russian and Ukrainian.

For more information about the app, go to www.aliorbank.pl/aplikacja.

developer: Powszechna Kasa Oszczednosci Bank Polski S.A
description:
Manage your PKO Bank Polski/Inteligo account from your mobile phone with the IKO app (electronic banking service).
- See recent transactions and check your balance,
- View details of current and saving accounts, cards, term deposits, loans, travel insurance,
- Pay in traditional and online stores using only BLIK code from the IKO app,
- Withdraw money from ATMs without a card,
- Top up your cell phone balance,
- Make transfers, also to a mobile phone number without the need to enter an account number, 
- Create standing orders or multiple transfers to set more transfers to the same receiver,
- Apply for: an account, a deposit, a travel & vehicle insurance, a loan*, an overdraft*,
- Save money in virtual moneyboxes,
- Create BLIK vouchers to pay in stores and withdraw money from ATMs (Internet connection not necessary),
- Find your nearest branch or ATM to withdraw cash with the BLIK code.

To learn more, visit iko.pkobp.pl 

* Not available for Inteligo customers.

Send money smarter. Skip surprise fees. Save more. 
Why juggle three apps when one can do it all? Whether you travel, shop online, study or work abroad, ZEN.COM gives you everything in one app: one card, multi-currency account, secure transfers, fair exchange rates, rewards, and buyer protection. Trusted by thousands across Europe and beyond, ZEN.COM keeps your money safe and payments simple. 
 
Travel without borders 
Grabbing coffee on your trip abroad? With ZEN.COM, you pay like a local. Exchange your money easily at fair rates and skip hidden fees that many banks still charge. Spend in the currencies you need, including euros, dollars, and yen. Withdraw cash worldwide with no extra charges (within your plan). 
Shape 

Receive and send money abroad, faster and cheaper 
International transfers shouldn’t take days or cost a fortune. With ZEN.COM, you send money fast and at low cost across Europe, worldwide, or card-to-card. 
Need to send money instantly to another ZEN user? Send it free with ZEN Buddies.  
Shape 

Instant top-ups, easy and secure payments 
Paying for streaming? Shopping online? ZEN.COM makes it effortless. Top up instantly in 30+ ways: card, bank transfer, local methods, or even cash. Your money, exactly the moment you need it. 

Pay anywhere with Apple Pay. Use your phone or watch as your wallet, and track spending in real time.  
Spend smart. Get rewarded. 
 
Every time you pay with your ZEN PRO Card, you collect Shards and Stones to redeem for rewards or money back. In selected markets, you also get instant cashback at partner stores (electronics, fashion, beauty, sports, and more) – it’s real money added directly to your account. No points, no waiting. 
Shape 
Your purchases, protected 
 
Shopping online or withdrawing cash abroad? With ZEN Care, you’re covered from start to finish. If something goes wrong, we’ll take care of the claim. Plus, get up to 2 extra years of warranty on electronics bought with your ZEN PRO Card. 

Why switch to ZEN.COM? 
* Instant savings: no hidden fees and fair exchange rates 
* Safer shopping: buyer protection and extended warranty on electronics 
* All-in-one convenience: card, multi-currency account, local and global transfers and currency exchange in one app 
* Designed for international professionals, travelers, expats, students and online shoppers 
* Trusted by thousands across Europe and beyond 

 
Download now and simplify how you spend, send and save at home or abroad.

app_name: mBank PL - Twój bank i finanse
description:
Kontroluj swoje finanse, sprawdzaj historię transakcji i błyskawicznie wysyłaj przelewy online. Płać w sklepie lub internecie za pomocą BLIKA lub Apple Pay. Korzystaj ze swojej bankowości online o każdej porze dnia i nocy. Konto w mBanku założysz łatwo wygodnie przez aplikację. 

Co zyskasz z aplikacją mBanku? 

Bezpieczeństwo
W aplikacji znajdziesz narzędzia wspierające Twoje bezpieczeństwo w codziennym bankowaniu:
•	bezpieczne logowanie i autoryzacja
•	lista zaleceń bezpieczeństwa
•	darmowy dostęp do specjalistów od bezpieczeństwa w sieci
•	tymczasowa blokada lub zastrzeżenie karty w ciągu kilku sekund
•	limity i powiadomienia push o transakcjach
•	ukrywanie kwot na pulpicie

Finanse osobiste pod kontrolą
W każdym momencie sprawdzisz stan swojego konta bankowego, przejrzysz historię transakcji i zaplanowane płatności.  

Menedżer finansów pomoże Ci zadbać o domowy budżet
•	jednym kliknięciem sprawdzisz swoje wpływy i wydatki
•	automatycznie je posegregujemy i przypiszemy do wybranej kategorii
•	na przejrzystych wykresach zobaczysz swoje wpływy i wydatki, w podziale na lata lub miesiące
•	ustawisz swój miesięczny budżet
Szybkie przelewy
•	błyskawicznie przelewaj na numer telefonu, nawet jeśli nie znasz numeru konta odbiorcy
•	zamiast wysyłać znajomym numer konta, wyślij im kod QR
•	skanuj dane do przelewu bez konieczności wprowadzania długich numerów kont

Wygodne płatności kartą
•	płać kartą do konta w sklepie i internecie
•	korzystaj z płatności zbliżeniowych
•	dodaj kartę do płatności mobilnych Apple Pay i płać telefonem

Płatności BLIK
•	płać za zakupy w internecie i sklepach stacjonarnych
•	wypłacaj pieniądze z bankomatu
•	przelewaj na numer telefonu - nie musisz znać numeru konta odbiorcy, wystarczy jego numer telefonu
•	wysyłaj prośbę o przelew na telefon i rozliczaj się łatwo ze znajomymi 

Oszczędności i inwestycje
Konto oszczędnościowe, lokaty, fundusze, giełda – znajdź swój sposób na odkładanie pieniędzy na małe i duże plany. 

Ubezpieczenia
Skorzystaj z oferty naszych ubezpieczeń i chroń siebie, bliskich oraz swoje mienie. Przygotuj się na niespodziewane.

Szybki kredyt online
Kliknij po szybki kredyt, gdy potrzebujesz dodatkowej gotówki.
Bez zbędnych i czasochłonnych formalności.

Elastyczne limity
Planujesz większy wydatek? Zmień jednym kliknięciem limity dla kart lub płatności BLIK.

Dopasuj aplikację do siebie
•	utwórz skróty na pulpicie do ulubionych funkcji
•	wybierz najwygodniejszy sposób logowania – Touch ID, Face ID lub PIN
•	ustaw produkty, które chcesz widzieć po zalogowaniu, np. konto, kartę kredytową, rachunek walutowy
•	ukryj wszystkie kwoty na pulpicie

Mobilna autoryzacja
Szybko i bezpiecznie potwierdzaj swoje operacje, bez przepisywania haseł SMS. Dane operacji znajdziesz w powiadomieniu autoryzacyjnym w telefonie. Klikasz, zatwierdzasz i gotowe.
 
Powiadomienia push
Ustaw bezpłatne powiadomienia push i bądź zawsze na bieżąco, z tym co dzieje się na Twoim koncie. To Ty decydujesz, jakie powiadomienia chcesz otrzymywać.

mOkazje
Płać naszą kartą i odbieraj zwroty za wybrane zakupy - prosto na swoje konto. 

Szybka pomoc i kontakt
Skorzystaj z intuicyjnej wyszukiwarki i znajdź szybko odpowiedzi na swoje pytania. Jeśli potrzebujesz pomocy naszego pracownika, napisz na czacie lub połącz się przez mLinię na klik. Wystarczy jedno kliknięcie. Bez dodatkowych haseł i kodów od razu będziemy wiedzieć, że to Ty!

Skorzystaj z dodatkowych usług w aplikacji:
•	zapłać za parking
•	wymieniaj waluty
•	załatwiaj sprawy bankowe i urzędowe (np. wnioski 800+, 300+)
•	doładuj telefon
•	sprawdzaj stan konta przed zalogowaniem
•	znajdź najbliższe bankomaty, wpłatomaty i placówki

To nie wszystko, co przygotowaliśmy dla Ciebie w aplikacji mBanku! Przekonaj się, co potrafi nasza aplikacji i pobierz ją na swój telefon.

mBank PL 
ul. Prosta 18
00-850 Warszawa

**Moje ING mobile has the title of the best banking app in Poland for the third year in a row.**

With Moje ING mobile app, you'll do everything you do in banking on a computer - no need to choose where to log in. All the functions are in the app. What will you do in Moje ING mobile? You can:
- check your account balance and transaction history,
- log in with your fingerprint, facial recognition or PIN number,
- pay for purchases with your card on your phone,
- arrange official matters with a Trusted Profile,
- recharge your phone,
- buy top-ups for Netflix, Spotify and other media platforms,
- download discount codes for cheaper purchases.


Here you have everything you expect from a bank:
- make a transfer, pay bills, pay off a credit card, set up standing orders,
- set savings goals and see your progress,
- set up accounts, deposits, apply for loans or other bank products,
- change card transaction limits.


Moje ING means easy payments, deposits and withdrawals:
- BLIK code - you can use it to pay for purchases on the Internet and in stationary stores. You'll also withdraw money from an ATM and deposit cash at our deposit machines, including to your savings account. (from the age of 13)
- BLIK phone transfers - you don't need to rewrite the recipient's account number, you just need to enter their phone number.
- BLIK phone transfer requests and bill splitting so you can easily settle your accounts. (from the age of 13)


Features you can use only with the application:
- Account status before logging in - you can set the view of the amount or percentage.
- Shortcuts before logging in - you can choose which functions are most important to you and which you want to access quickly.
- Push notifications for payments.
- View your account balance on Apple Watch.
- Parking payments - pay conveniently for parking in the app, without searching for parking meters - and only for actual parking time.


Security in Moje ING mobile app:
Access to the app is protected by an individual 4-digit PIN number, and entering the PIN number incorrectly 3 times will block access to the app. Data on accounts and other bank products is not stored in the phone's memory, which increases the security of this data in case of loss of the device. Communication between the application and the bank's system is encrypted.


ING is also a bank for children. Moje ING is available from the age of 6. With your supervision, your child will take their first steps in the world of finance and achieve their goals. To use Moje ING for Kids, start by opening an account for your child or ordering a prepaid card for your child.

With Moje ING, the child:
- Will send a request to a parent for a regular transfer, BLIK phone transfer, transfer to a prepaid card, savings account, and the parent will confirm or reject it,
- will send a request for money to a parent, and the parent will confirm or reject it,
- will learn how to save and manage their money,
- will use Savings Goals to more easily fulfill their dreams,
- will ask a parent to load an account or prepaid card.


Learn more about the Moje ING app at: https://www.ing.pl/aplikacja
 
Moje ING mobile has been recognized as the best bank mobile application in Poland in the "Mobile Trends Awards" competitions. ING Bank Śląski was named the best bank in Poland in the "Instytucja Roku 2024" competition.

In the new version you will find account balance, transfers, Your products, BLIK, Santander open, Kantor Santander or the bank's offer.
Adjust the application to yourself. Tell us how to address you and set the wallpaper.

Click on the eye symbol on your Global position and enable Discrete Mode. Thanks to it, when you are, for example, in a tram, the people next to you will not see how much money you have in your account.

Keep up to date with everything that is happening on your account and card thanks to Alerts24 and quick view. 

The Finance Assistant shows you a clear chart with the history of your expenses and income, while the Subscriptions section lets you see how much you’re paying monthly across selected services.

In the Price guide, we will tell you how much you need to maintain a Santander account and the monthly fee for the card is PLN 0.

With the application you can pay contactless with BLIK or Google Pay. If you know BLIK contactless payments from the previous application, re-enable them in this one.

In the application, you can also check your card details, pay for parking and motorway tolls, buy public transport tickets or event tickets.

The app gives you access to your insurance details, including policy number and coverage period.

For more information about the app visit:
https://www.santander.pl/aplikacja

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Aplikacja mobilna Santander Consumer Banku w nowej odsłonie! 

Odświeżyliśmy jej wygląd, poprawiliśmy wygodę korzystania i zadbaliśmy o większą dostępność cyfrową.

Aplikacja dedykowana jest wszystkim Klientom, którzy podpisali Umowę o świadczenie usług bankowości elektronicznej oraz mają lub mieli umowę produktową.
Dzięki aplikacji mobilnej masz wygodny kontakt z bankiem przez czat i panel wiadomości oraz dostęp do informacji o swoich produktach kredytowych lub oszczędnościowych.

Jeśli masz kredyt gotówkowy, konsolidacyjny, ratalny lub celowy:
- sprawdzisz harmonogram kredytu: ilość rat i kwotę pozostałą do spłaty,
- wygodnie spłacisz raty kredytu,
- zobaczysz historię wpłat,
- zobaczysz szczegóły umowy i inne dokumenty.

Jeśli masz kartę kredytową:
- sprawdzisz dostępne środki,
- zobaczysz wykonane transakcje,
- wygodnie i szybko spłacisz kartę,
- zobaczysz swoje zestawienia, szczegóły umowy i inne dokumenty.

Dodatkowo, możesz aktywować nową kartę, zmienić PIN do karty, ustawić lub zmienić hasło do transakcji internetowych, ustalić limity transakcji, zablokować czasowo lub trwale zastrzec kartę w przypadku kradzieży lub zgubienia.

Jeśli masz rachunek oszczędnościowy lub lokatę:
- zarządzisz swoimi oszczędnościami,
- zobaczysz prognozowany zysk i termin zakończenia lokaty,
- sprawdzisz historię transakcji na rachunku oraz wypracowane odsetki,
- wypłacisz środki z rachunku,
- sprawdzisz dane do wpłaty środków na rachunek,
- zobaczysz szczegóły umowy i dokumenty.

Gain more with the Benefit Club.
Open the app and join the Benefit Club. You may get exceptional discounts on what you like and need.

Browse through our exceptional offers.
In CA24 Mobile, you will see our offers, which we have prepared right for you and your business. 

Open a personal or business account and make yourself at home in the world of state-of-the-art banking.

Make yourself at home in the world of state-of-the-art banking.
We have designed our app to make banking easy and intuitive for you - just as you expect. 

Daily banking and more in less than no time.
Check your transaction history, account balance, savings - in just two taps. 

Enjoy our app’s modern design.
We have also made our app a feast for your eyes and a pleasure to use... See for yourself! 

… and let’s stay in touch! 
Using the app, you can easily get in touch with our advisor via chat or phone. We'll know right away that it's you and we'll be able to help you faster.

Bank Millennium mobile app easily adapts to individual needs. It is convenient, easy to use and offers a far wider freedom when it comes to managing finances your way. The mobile app is available in Polish and English.

Accounts:
•	Balance account, history and details
•	Transfers between own accounts, domestic, instant, to phone number
•	ZUS and tax transfer
•	Phone top-ups
•	Defining and editing beneficiaries
•	Applying for overdraft and overdraft increase
•	Account number sharing
•	Downloading and sending PDF files with transaction confirmation
•	Repeating transfers
•	Return transfer
•	Upcoming payments list
•	My finances summary

Cards (debit, credit, prepaid):
•	Adding cards to your Apple Pay wallet from the mobile app
•	Cards history
•	Repaying credit cards
•	Transfers from credit cards
•	Topping up prepaid cards
•	Increasing credit card limit (available as a special offer)
•	Activation/blocking cards
•	Defining/changing PIN code
•	Changing transaction limits
•	Blocking cards outside EU
•	Convenient instalments on a credit card

Deposits:
•	Viewing deposit details
•	Opening a deposit
•	Deposit redemption

Loans:
•	Details, repayment plan and credit history
•	Taking new loans (available as a special offer)

Insurance:
•	Motor insurance
•	Travel insurance

BLIK mobile payments:
•	BLIK transfer to mobile
•	Payments in traditional and online shops
•	Withdrawals from ATMs
•	Issuing checks

Other:
•	Apple Watch
•	Login with Touch ID
•	3D Touch support
•	Tickets and parking fares
•	Cinema tickets
•	Automatic payments for motorways
•	Widgets before logging in with account and card balance, BLIK codes, access to loyalty cards
•	Bank branches and ATMs map
•	Exchange rates
•	App desktop customization
•	Finance Manager
•	Loyalty cards service
•	Push notifications

Access to the mobile app is protected with an individual PIN code (or Touch ID service), and operations have to be additionally confirmed with a password.
More about Bank Millennium mobile app at https://www.bankmillennium.pl/en/electronic-banking/mobile-banking/mobile-application-individuals-business.
More about Bank Millennium products at https://www.bankmillennium.pl/en/.

developer: Bank Polska Kasa Opieki Spolka Akcyjna
description:
Z aplikacją PeoPay masz szybki i wygodny dostęp z poziomu smartfona do swojego konta osobistego i firmowego, kart oraz oszczędności. Zyskujesz dostęp do swoich finansów 24/7 – niezależnie od tego, gdzie jesteś. W aplikacji m.in. sprawdzisz saldo i historię konta bankowego, opłacisz rachunki, skorzystasz z BLIKA, a także złożysz online wniosek o kartę kredytową lub pożyczkę gotówkową. Wszystko to bez wychodzenia z domu! 

Nie jesteś klientem Pekao? Otwórz konto na selfie w PeoPay lub przez mObywatel albo udaj się do oddziału. 

Odkryj z nami zalety bankowości mobilnej!

Co umożliwi Ci aplikacja PeoPay?

• Dostęp do wszystkich produktów w Banku Pekao S.A. oraz ich historii.
• Składanie dyspozycji do Twoich produktów i komunikacja z bankiem w sekcji Twoje sprawy.
• Dostęp do oferty kredytowej, oszczędnościowej i ubezpieczeniowej.
• Dostęp do rachunków w innych bankach.
• Szybkie logowanie i zatwierdzanie operacji biometrycznie (odciskiem palca, FaceID, czyli rozpoznawaniem twarzy) lub PIN-em.
• Przelewy natychmiastowe Express Elixir oraz przelewy Sorbnet.
• Przelewy krajowe i zagraniczne oraz doładowania telefonu.
• Możliwość zakupu biletów MPK oraz biletów parkingowych.
• Automatyczne płatności za przejazdy autostradami krajowymi oraz zakup e-winiet na przejazdy płatnymi drogami zagranicznymi.
• Zarządzanie funkcjami podnoszącymi bezpieczeństwo pieniędzy np. ustawienia limitów, wiadomości push, blokada kanałów dostępu, potwierdzanie w aplikacji logowania do serwisu internetowego.
• Transakcje BLIK (w tym: przelewy na telefon, prośby o przelew, płacenie telefonem w sklepach stacjonarnych oraz internetowych z możliwością skopiowania kodu BLIK do pamięci, internetowe płatności bez konieczności ponownego użycia kodu, wypłaty gotówki z bankomatów i terminali (cashback) z logo BLIK, wpłaty gotówki we wpłatomatach z logo BLIK),płatności w internecie przez skanowanie kodu QR.
• Za Twoją zgodą - dostęp do oferty pożyczki gotówkowej oraz karty kredytowej „na klik”.
• Wymiana walut po preferencyjnych kursach.
• Procentowy lub kwotowy podgląd salda przed zalogowaniem.
• Obsługa rachunku indywidualnego i firmowego w jednej aplikacji.
• Korzystanie z wyszukiwarki w historii operacji, przelew z historii operacji i przelew zwrotny.
• Zarządzanie produktami dziecka dzięki Panelowi rodzica.
• Dostęp do programu rabatowego Okazje z Żubrem i innych bonusów.
• Opcje personalizacji np. możliwość wyboru tła, awatara, ustawienia skrótów i widgetów do ulubionych miejsc w aplikacji. 

Jeszcze więcej funkcji w jedne apce!

• Zakładanie konta oszczędnościowego, osobistego lub walutowego i wnioski o nowe produkty.
• Analiza finansowa z podsumowaniem wydatków z podziałem na kategorie,
• Płatności w internecie bezpośrednio z rachunków walutowych (jak kartą wielowalutową).
• Kalendarz płatności zaplanowanych.
• Sprawdzenie historii operacji kont regularnych funduszy Pekao TFI.
• Dostęp do produktów inwestycyjnych i maklerskich (w tym Giełdy Papierów Wartościowych).
• Zarządzanie kartami debetowymi do rachunków: aktywacja, nadawanie i zmiana PIN, zmiana limitów transakcyjnych, zablokowanie / odblokowanie / zastrzeżenie karty.

W aplikacji możesz zmienić język na angielski lub ukraiński. Więcej informacji znajdziesz na www.pekao.com.pl/peopay.

GOmobile is BNP Paribas Bank’s mobile app. You can manage your finances in an easy and convenient way – wherever you are. 
Find out more about the app and it’s features and see for yourself, how easy everyday banking can be.
About GOmobile:  
-	Transfers and payments
Convenient own, domestic, foreign, phone, tax and instant transfers. You can add your favorite recipients to the log in screen or create a standing order.
-	BLIK 
A convenient and safe way to pay in stores, shop online, withdraw money from ATM’s and make peer-to-peer phone transfers.
-	Dark mode
Choose between themes (dark, light, system default)
-	Safe login
You decide how you want to log into the app and authorize operations – you can choose a PIN code or fingerprint or Face ID (if your smartphone has this feature). 
-	Additional services 
Whether you drive your car or commute by public transfer we’ve got a solution for you. You can buy tickets or pay for parking. If you’re planning a trip abroad, you can buy GOtravel travel insurance or exchange currencies at a convenient rate. 
-	Mobile authorization
If you’re using our online banking GOonline system or shop online, using your debit or credit card, you can authorize these operations in GOmobile. No need to type OTP codes from text messages. 
-	Product applications
New products at a hands reach when you need them. 
App’s features:
New customers:
•	Current account product application – no need to visit our branch or wait for the documents to be dispatched and delivered – you can confirm your identity by taking a photo of your ID card and recording a quick video 
Before logging in:
•	Transfers to your favorite recipients  
•	Balance preview
•	Tickets and parking
•	BLIK payments 
•	Branch locations
Start:
•	Products’ details
•	Shortcuts to most important features
•	Product history 
•	Hints on new and convenient features 
Finances:
•	Summary of funds and liabilities
•	Current, foreign currency and savings accounts, information on account’s balance, history, product details, managing accounts 
•	Term deposits – list of deposits, opening new deposits, breaking the deposits
•	Cards – history and details of your debit and credit cards, managing cards, adding cards to Apple Wallet
•	Loans and credits – details, installment repayment 
•	Investments – information about your products
•	Travel insurance GOtravel – buy insurance and check the details of your insurance policy 
Payments:
•	Domestic, instant, own, phone tax, foreign, and instant transfers
•	Standing orders 
•	Mobile top-up
•	Credit card and loan installment repayment – from an account at BNP Paribas, from an account held at another bank, using BLIK
•	BLIK code
For You:
•	Product applications – new savings and foreign currency accounts, deposits, overdraft, credit and debit card as well as loan applications
•	GOtravel insurance
Services:
•	Currency exchange
•	Tickets
•	Parking
•	GOtravel insurance
•	Rent
Profile:
•	Chat and messages from BNP Paribas
•	Authorization history
•	Settings (BLIK, personal data, appearance, default profile, main product, notifications, marketing consents, GOcity, balance preview before login)
•	Security (fingerprint or Face ID login and authorization, PIN code change, mobile authorization)
•	Contact (branch locations, contact information, click2call) 
•	App information, language settings (Polish, English, Ukrainian, Russian), app deactivation

Join over 17 million users worldwide who trust tricount to split bills, track expenses, and settle up—free and unlimited.

tricount is the easiest way to split costs, manage group expenses, and settle balances with friends, roomies, or your partner. Whether you're organizing a trip, splitting rent, or going out to dinner, tricount helps you stay on top of every bill—fairly and stress-free.

Why Choose tricount?
• Free & unlimited – No subscription, no hidden fees, no limit on tricounts or expenses
• Fair splits – Even for uneven amounts
• Great for roomies, couples, friends, or any shared situation
• Ideal for cost split on rent, trips, groceries, shared budgets, and more
• Real-time bill tracking with clear payback and balance overviews
• Send and receive payment requests instantly through the app
• Built-in calculator for easy amounts per person
• Share expense photos and track everything—even offline
• Supports multiple currencies for international trips
• Better than spreadsheets—and easier than Splitwise

Whether you're planning a getaway, splitting a check, or managing household costs, tricount is the smart, simple way to share expenses and stay organized.

Download tricount today – the best way to split, track, and settle group expenses. 100% free, unlimited, and trusted by millions.

No bank account or credit card? No problem. 

Download the PaysafeCard app and explore how you can use your cash online, get gift cards or use our app as a wallet with your personal debit Mastercard and IBAN.  
 
Access everything you need in a single tap. 

PaysafeCard
Register for free and pay with cash online. 
- Sign up (16+) and make payments within minutes of downloading the app Buy a prepaid code in 600.000+ sales outlets worldwide  
- Get a PaysafeCard code from the app. Simply select the payment method of your choice and buy one from the comfort of your own home at no additional cost 
- Use your PaysafeCard balance on over 3,500 websites including your favorite igaming and entertainment sites by entering your login details at the checkout  
- Stay safe by not sharing personal and financial details online   
- Manage your balance conveniently in in the app 
- Keep control of your costs through prepaid payments  

Account & Card*
Upgrade to Account & Card, the alternative to your bank account. Activate our feature online or in the app today to receive your debit Mastercard and your personal IBAN. 
- Register an account in minutes (18+)   
- Instant SEPA bank transfers  
- Physical & virtual debit Mastercards  
- Worldwide payments with your card including Apple Pay  
- Cash withdrawals at any ATM  
- Cash deposits via PaysafeCard and Paysafecash  
- Keep track of your transactions 

Gift Card Shop
Buy vouchers for your favourite shops, like the PlayStation Store, XBox, Twitch, Netflix, Zalando and more. Give it to your loved ones or simply use it to protect your payment details online.  

Get your PaysafeCard prepaid codes without leaving your house. Simply buy them online without any extra fees.  

Questions
 
Please contact info@paysafecard.com or visit our website www.paysafecard.com for more information, assistance and our terms and conditions. You can also find us on Facebook, X and Instagram: @paysafecard  

Say goodbye to multiple apps and download PaysafeCard to simplify your finances.  

*Available in selected countries

SkyCash to wygoda dostępna pod jednym kliknięciem. Płać mobilnie za parkowanie, bilety komunikacji miejskiej, pociągi i autostrady w jednej aplikacji. Masz to w apce!

SkyCash to wszystko czego potrzebujesz w mieście, dostępne w zasięgu jednego kliknięcia. Parkowanie, komunikacja miejska, przejazdy taxi, pociągi, a nawet połączenia lotnicze to jedne z wielu produktów, za które zapłacisz dzięki aplikacji SkyCash. 

Uniwersalne rozwiązanie dla wszystkich, którzy cenią sobie wygodę i nie lubią tracić czasu na skomplikowane formalności lub stanie w kolejkach. Dołącz do ponad 2 milionów osób korzystających z naszych rozwiązań w całej Polsce. Zasługujesz na tę wygodę!


Szybka rejestracja

Postaw na wygodę otwierając konto SkyCash w wersji podstawowej lub przejdź do weryfikacji i w kilka minut zyskaj instrument płatniczy wraz z dostępem do wszystkich funkcjonalności finansowych aplikacji.

Bezpieczne płatności

SkyCash to licencjonowana instytucja płatnicza z kilkunastoletnim doświadczeniem na rynku. Dbamy o bezpieczeństwo Twoich transakcji, dlatego korzystamy ze sprawdzonych i silnych zabezpieczeń danych.


Twoja wygoda przede wszystkim

Kafle w naszej aplikacji to już nasz znak firmowy. Dzięki nim szybko znajdziesz to, czego szukasz.

 
Parkowanie proste jak nigdy

Usługa mobiParking dostępna jest w większości miast w Polsce. Dzięki niej szybko i sprawnie zapłacisz za parkowanie swoim telefonem. Już nigdy nie będziesz szukać parkometru ani drobnych. Zapłacisz za dokładny czas parkowania, bo możesz go dowolnie przedłużać, bez potrzeby wracania do samochodu. Listę miast objętych usługą znajdziesz na naszej stronie.

Bilet miejski zawsze pod ręką

W aplikacji SkyCash kupisz bilety komunikacji miejskiej i kolei aglomeracyjnych dla ponad 80 miast w Polsce. Usługa pozwala kupować bilety jednorazowe, czasowe i okresowe, normalne i ulgowe. Lista miast objętych usługą znajdziesz na naszej stronie.

 
Szybsze przejazdy autostradami

Usługa Autostrady to automatyczne i bezdotykowe płatności za przejazdy płatnymi odcinkami autostrad. Omijasz kolejki, bo korzystasz ze specjalnych bramek, dedykowanych do płatności automatycznych. Oszczędzasz czas, bo szlaban podnosi się sam.


Bilety PKP Intercity

W SkyCash kupisz bilety PKP Intercity, na wszystkie połączenia krajowe obsługiwane przez pociągi TLK, EIC oraz od Pendolino (EIP). Szybkie wyszukiwanie połączeń, a bilety dostępne do kontroli nawet, gdy jesteś offline.

 
Bilety na pociągi regionalne

Jeśli dużo podróżujesz, to aplikacja SkyCash będzie dla Ciebie niezbędna. Połączenia 9 przewoźników regionalnych kupisz w jednym miejscu. Znajdziesz u nas: Polregio, SKM Trójmiasto, Koleje Mazowieckie, Śląskie, Dolnośląskie, Wielkopolskie, Łódzkie oraz Arriva i Warszawskiej Kolei Dojazdowej.
 

Rozrywka dla każdego

W SkyCash każdy znajdzie dla siebie pomysł na ciekawe spędzenie wolnego czasu. Bilety do kina i Parków Narodowych. Kody do serwisów gamingowych i VOD. Subskrypcje muzyczne, prasowe i wiele innych. Wszystko w jednym miejscu.


Ubezpieczenie nie tylko w podróży

Wakacje, praca za granicą, wyjazdy na weekend, nowy samochód lub mieszkanie? Zawsze warto pamiętać o ubezpieczeniu dla siebie lub swoich bliskich. W SkyCash łatwo wyszukasz i porównasz oferty czołowych ubezpieczycieli.

  
Rozwiązanie dla Biznesu

SkyCash dla Firm to rozwiązanie, które ułatwi prowadzenie Twojej firmy. Zarządzanie flotą i podróżami służbowymi w prostym i intuicyjnym panelu administratora. Niezależnie od wielkości firmy rozliczanie płatności za parkowanie i komunikację miejską pracowników prowadzisz tylko raz w miesiącu.

Jeśli jesteś zainteresowany, chcesz udostępnić swoim klientom lub pracownikom nowy, wygodny kanał płatności – skontaktuj się z nami. Wyślij wiadomość na biznes@skycash.com Więcej możesz dowiedzieć się na skycashdlafirm.com

Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about “who owes who”. Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUS between friends 
- And so much more
 
Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
We also have powerful features that can handle almost any money sharing situation. Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for smartphones and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that reccur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Endorsements:
“Makes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.” - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." – The Financial Times
“I never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app”- Business Insider
“The Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind” - Thrillist
“Life Changing! I don’t review many things, but this app has seriously improved my quality of life. It has saved my sanity when it comes to splitting utilities, mortgage, groceries, dog expenses...the list goes on. No more saving receipts, making spreadsheets, and manually calculating each month. So handy for group trips/weekends, too! THANK YOU!!” – Courtney via the App Store

We offer in-app purchases for “Splitwise Pro”, the benefits of which are described below. The subscription amount will be charged to your App Store account and will vary by plan and country. You’ll see the total price before completing your first payment. If you don’t choose to purchase “Splitwise Pro”, you can continue using Splitwise for free.

Premium Subscription Service “Splitwise Pro”:
1. Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
2. OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
3. Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
4. Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
5. Access to “spending by category” budgeting tools and other charts
6. Search full expense history

“Splitwise Pro” subscriptions purchased in-app renew monthly or yearly depending on your plan. Plan pricing may vary by country. To avoid renewal, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your subscription ends. You can turn off auto-renew at any time by visiting the App Store.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://www.splitwise.com/terms

Pay easier than ever before with mPay!

Join 1.6 million users and manage all your finances in a single app.
- Visa mPay multicurrency Debit Card: Pay in Poland and abroad.
- Send & receive money with free instant money transfers to other users
- Public transport and train tickets: Buy fast, plan your trips, and skip the queues. Get tickets from top carriers in Poland, including PKP Intercity and POLREGIO.
- Parking payments: Pay only for the time you park. Stop and resume parking anytime, anywhere.
- Car and travel insurance: Access dozens of offers in seconds.
- Need some extra cash? Get loans in the app—quick and hassle-free.

Flexible loan options tailored to your needs:
- Up to PLN 3,000* – first loan with RRSO 0%, repay in 61 days.
- Up to PLN 9,000 – RRSO 69.93%, repay in up to 12 months.
- Up to PLN 25,000 – RRSO 54.12%, repay in up to 42 months.

Download the app now and enjoy freedom in your everyday payments!

The minimum and maximum loan period available to customers through mPay S.A. is 61 days. The minimum and maximum APR for the first loan is 0%, provided the loan is repaid within 61 days. The maximum APR for subsequent loans is 76.88%, provided the loan is repaid within 61 days. The loan provider is Soonly Finance sp. z o.o. Loan approval depends on the applicant’s creditworthiness assessment.

Representative example for subsequent loans provided through mPay S.A.:
Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 76.88% based on the following assumptions: total loan amount PLN 2,900; total amount to be repaid PLN 3,190; fixed annual interest rate: 0%; total loan cost: PLN 290 (fee: PLN 290, interest: PLN 0); agreement duration: 61 days. Data as of January 2, 2025.

The personal data administrator is Soonly Finance sp. z o.o., headquartered at ul. Żwirki i Wigury 16c, 02-092 Warsaw, Poland. Tax ID (NIP): 525-253-13-20, REGON: 146101268. Registered at the District Court for the Capital City of Warsaw in Warsaw, 14th Commercial Division of the National Court Register, KRS 0000418977. Entry number in the Register of Credit Intermediaries and Loan Institutions maintained by the Polish Financial Supervision Authority: RIP000020. Share capital: PLN 40,019,100.

All information regarding the principles of personal data processing, purposes of processing, legal grounds, categories of data recipients, data processing periods, whether providing data is mandatory or voluntary, the consequences of not providing data, automated decision-making, and your rights can be found in our Privacy Policy: https://www.vivus.pl/polityka-prywatnosci.

Fast, secure and low-cost transfers, powered by Paysend - the world’s largest digital payment network. Paysend makes global payments easy. Send money worldwide to over 170 countries with low fees, real-time exchange rates and secure remittance – all in minutes.

Send money worldwide 
Stay connected with loved ones through bank transfers, mobile wallets or instant money transfers. Paysend offers flexible options to fit your needs.

Fast, secure, and reliable transfers
Your international transfer arrives quickly – most payments are completed in minutes. With real-time exchange rates, your recipient gets exactly what you send.

Zero-fee bank transfers
Enjoy bank transfers with no extra costs when sending money abroad – helping you save more while supporting family and friends.

Send money to cards instantly
Our unique card-to-card transfers let you send money directly to Visa, Mastercard or UnionPay cards, with a flat transparent fee of just £1, €1.50, or $1.99.

Transparent fees & great FX rates
No surprises, no hidden charges. Paysend provides competitive foreign exchange (FX) rates with upfront pricing, so you always know how much will arrive.

Secure & trusted service
With enterprise-grade security, PCI DSS compliance and 24/7 support, your transfers are protected at every step.

Join 10 million+ customers worldwide
Paysend is trusted by over 10 million people globally. With 33,000+ Trustpilot reviews, 85% rate us as excellent for reliable and safe transfers.

Download Paysend & start sending money today
Skip the hassle of traditional remittance services. With Paysend, you can track transfers, access multi-currency payments and send funds instantly from your phone.

Additional information
Paysend plc is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority in the United Kingdom, reference number 900004. Company number SC376020.

Paysend is a registered ‘Visa Direct’ and ‘Mastercard MoneySend’ originating institution. All ‘transactions’ and ‘data’ are secured at the highest PCI DSS level 1 standards.

Paysend Global HQ: 20 Garrick Street, London, WC2E 9BT, United Kingdom

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Revolut is the money app designed to spend, save, and set money aside.

What's in store:
• Get your own customisable debit card and virtual cards to add to your Apple or Google Wallet (personalisation fees may apply)
• Send money between friends on Revolut (minimum age restriction applies)
• Receive money from everyone — even if they’re not on Revolut — with Payment Links
• Save and earn with a Savings account
• Get a 360º view of your money with Analytics
• If you’re in the UK, you can move to the main app once you turn 16

 
How does it work?
1. Download this app and create an account (if you're below the age of data consent, your parent will need to create an account for you from their Revolut app. You can check the age of data consent in your country below)
2. Get approved by your parent or guardian
3. Choose a debit card and customise it with text, stickers, and your own sketches (personalisation fees may apply), then order it from your parent's app
4. Add your card to Apple or Google Wallet to start spending straight away (minimum age restriction applies)
 
Parents and guardians, this part's for you ↓
With Revolut, they can manage their money independently, under your supervision.
Teens above the age of data consent can sign up themselves, but you'll have access to security controls, like spending notifications, in-app card freezes, and many other features to give you peace of mind.
If you have teens below the age of data consent, you can create an account for them from your Revolut app. Here’s how: 
1. Have them download this app and create an account
2. Approve their account from your Revolut app
3. Order their prepaid debit card from your app (personalisation fees may apply)

Find your country's age of data consent ↓

In Bulgaria, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Gibraltar, Iceland, Latvia, Malta, Norway, Portugal, Singapore, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, or the United States:
• Teens aged 13+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Teens aged 12 or under (minimum age restrictions apply) will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 13+

In Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Italy, Lithuania, or Spain:
• Teens aged 14+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 13 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 14+

In Australia, Czech Republic, Greece, or Slovenia:
• Teens aged 15+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 14 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 15+ (referrals subject to feature availability in your country)

In Croatia, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Romania, or Slovakia:
• Teens aged 16 and above can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those ages 15 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 16+

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.
